newsitem.title: UK: TEST STORY - ALPHA DELETION STORY DATE 4-MAR-97, DB AR2.
newsitem.headline: TEST STORY - ALPHA DELETION STORY DATE 4-MAR-97, DB AR2.

text.p: TEST STORY - ALPHA TEXTLINE MIGRATION, STORY DATE 4-MAR-97, DB AR2. But he said: "Let's be careful that public opinion doesn't see in all of this a hike in VAT and prices." France is pushing through unpopular austerity measures in a bid to cut budget deficit to qualify for a single European currency from 1999.
Support for the amendment collapsed and just two members of the centre-right coalition voted for the amendment, with others in the 577-seat parliament voting against along with opposition
